title: Top 10 Best Waste Management Companies In Europe 2023 - Inventiva
summary: Waste management is crucial for public health, environmental protection, resource conservation, energy generation, and economic benefits. Some of the top waste management companies in Europe are Veolia, SUEZ, Renewi, Biffa, FCC Environment, ECOLOGIC, Ragn-Sells, Remondis, Ros Roca, and Amey.
green_innovation: TRUE, because waste management and recycling contribute to environmental sustainability goals, such as reducing pollution, conserving natural resources, and promoting circular economy principles.
business_innovation: TRUE, because developing new waste management technologies and processes qualifies as business innovation.
green_product: FALSE, because the article does not describe a specific product that meets the criteria to be a green product.
green_process: TRUE, because waste management and recycling processes contribute to environmental sustainability goals.
likely_naics_codes: ['562112 - Solid Waste Collection', '562111 - Solid Waste Landfill', '562920 - Materials Recovery Facilities', '562211 - Hazardous Waste Treatment and Disposal']
greenwashing: FALSE, because the article does not provide any indication that the described waste management and recycling processes are examples of greenwashing.
